Address.value: 420 SAW MILL RIVER ROAD, ARDSLEY, New York, 10502, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Acorda Therapeutics Inc is a biopharmaceutical company focused on developing therapies that restore function and improve the lives of people with neurological disorders. Acorda uses scientific, clinical, and commercial expertise in neurology as strategic points of access in additional nervous system markets, including stroke, Parkinson's disease, and epilepsy. The company does not operate separate lines of business with respect to any of its products or product candidates. All of its net product revenue is derived from the United States.
